name: SEARCH ALL - CANDLES
description:
SEARCH ALL - CANDLES

is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the candles in a large location. Candles will be placed in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places. The entire game location looks lively because of the animation elements. Find all the candles! Don't let them go unnoticed :)

Key Features:
- Animation elements on location;
- 100 candles to find;
- Pleasant soundtrack;
- The gameplay can be interrupted at any time, and the game will automatically save the result;
- Implemented hints! If you find it difficult to find an item, use the hint!
